snippet: An avalanche engulfed houses and cut off roads in eastern Afghanistan on Monday, killing at least 45 people, the latest victims in the country’s worst winter in 30 years.
abstract: Avalanche in eastern Afghanistan engulfs houses and cuts of roads, killing at least 45 people; heavy snow blocks roads leading to the area, preventing rescuers from reaching the victims.
lead_paragraph: An avalanche engulfed houses and cut off roads in eastern Afghanistan on Monday, killing at least 45 people, the latest victims in the country’s worst winter in 30 years.

headline.main: Afghanistan: Avalanche Kills Dozens and Blocks Roads
headline.print_headline: Afghanistan: Avalanche Kills Dozens and Blocks Roads
